title: Gogodala (1987) Genesis Portion
description: The Gogodala–Suki or Suki – Aramia River languages are a small language family of Papua New Guinea, spoken in the region of the Aramia River. The four language are clearly related.
provider: Bible Society of Papua New Guinea

language.name: Gogodala
language.area: Western Province, north bank of Fly River, Aramia River. 301 villages.
